title: Raven's Redemption
description: The only way out was death.The President of the Hell Riders OMC was a modern-day outlaw who lived by no code other than his own.Savannah Summer's belief that there was beauty in his tormented soul left him yearning for the unattainable.A normal life and the love of a good woman.But no matter how much he craved it, he couldn't have it. Or her.He was born with the keys to the Gates of Hell and baptized in blood. His sins were too many. His crimes too numerous. His past steeped in violence.The only way to protect the woman he loved from the life he lived was to let her go.They called him Raven, and love was his highway to hellâ€¦No Way Out is a complete story with HEA and no cliffhangers, BUT there is a sub-plot that continues through the entire series!Please note: this book contains mature content and graphic violence.
author: Tonya Brooks
